name: R.E.Member
description:
A camp abandoned, a clan disowned, and a deity betrayed.  These are the truths, but can you R.E.Member why?  A single player, puzzle and exploration game.  Will you make the necessary sacrifices to discover the past, or will you remain trapped in an endless cycle of dreams?

R.E.Member is a game set within two mirrored words: one explored while awake, the other while dreaming.  You will explore these parallel worlds, sacrificing your exploration time, exploration scope, or core senses to access new areas and solve puzzles.  Collect pieces of a broken artifact, restore the forest, and break free of the cycle you are trapped in. 

R.E.Member was made for the 9th Pirate Software game jam.  The themes of the jam were "Sacrifice is Strength," and had an artistic theme of "2-bit color/Restricted color palette."
